base_description: Gray, cubic object with a simple design.
part_description: The object has six equal square faces, arranged symmetrically. Each face is flat and smooth, forming a perfect cube.
internal_interaction_description: The faces of the cube are connected at right angles, creating a uniform, stable structure. Each edge of the cube joins two faces, maintaining the overall geometric integrity.
external_interaction_description: The cube can be placed on flat surfaces, interacting with gravity to remain stable. It may serve as a storage unit, seat, or decorative element, depending on its material and context.
